hero.title: Hack the World
hero.description: Mountain Mouth Inc. was founded on March 23, 2021 by engineer who love Linux, Vim and Bitcoin.

1.title: Laziness
1.description: The quality that makes you go to great effort to reduce overall energy expenditure. It makes you write labor-saving programs that other people will find useful, and document what you wrote so you don't have to answer so many questions about it.

2.title: Impatience
2.description: The anger you feel when the computer is being lazy. This makes you write programs that don't just react to your needs, but actually anticipate them. Or at least pretend to.

3.title: Hubris
3.description: Hubris: The quality that makes you write (and maintain) programs that other people won't want to say bad things about.

latest-news.title: Latest News
latest-news.description: Stay up-to-date with our latest news.
